title: A Main Delay Smokes at Different Stages
description: Here are two different Delay smokes for A Main that can be used at different stages of the round. The first smoke is useful at the very beginning of the round for your team to take space in A Main, and the second smoke is useful later into the round while enemy players are executing onto Site.

title: C Site Execute Sky Smokes
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto C Site with your team.

title: Standard A Site Execute Sky Smokes
description: Use these standard smokes when pushing onto A Site with your team.

title: A Main + A Tree Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary Combo
description: Use Sky Smokes to make it more difficult for enemy players to push through these key choke points into A Site.

title: Early Round A Main Sky Smoke to Contest Space
description: Use this early round A Main Sky + Molly combo to contest space in A Main.

title: Delay Sky Smoke + Molly for C Bend
description: Use this delay Sky Smoke + Molly combo for C Bend to make it more difficult for other players to take control of C Site.

title: B Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Incendiary
description: Here's a simple, but effective, B Site chokepoint delay setup.

title: C Site Chokepoint Delay Sky Smoke + Molly
description: Here's a simple, but effective C Site chokepoint delay setup.

title: Early Round Fault Line for A Long
description: Here's a simple, but effective Fault Line that can be used to show Attacker presence toward A Site, or during a fast push onto A Site.

title: Mid to B Site Flashpoint
description: A good flash to clear into B Site from middle.

title: C Site Retake Fauline + Flashes
description: Here's a great Faultline + Flash setup to support your teammates as they push into C Site.

title: Early Round A Lobby Fault Line
description: Here's a simple, and yet very effective early round Fault Line. This can be used to support teammates, or to make it somewhat more difficult for enemy players to push into A Lobby so that your team has more time to play around enemy sound queues from A Lobby.

title: A Site Retake Setup for Under Heaven
description: Here's a great full utility setup, that works especially well if your team plays around your utility well. So, make sure to call out when you're using each piece of utility.

title: B Garage to B Site Aftershock
description: This is a good aftershock to kill or push your opponent out of B Site allowing you to push and take control.

title: A Main to Mid Vents Fault Line
description: This is a good fault line to assist your teammates in mid and allow them to get into mid vents.

title: B Garage to B Site Flashpoint
description: This is a good flashpoint for B Site that blind anyone playing close left or B Heaven.

title: A Main to A Rafter Aftershock
description: This aftershock allows you to get a kill on anyone playing in both A Rafter and under it.

title: A Main to A Site Flash
description: This flash allows you to blind the entire A site and A Rafter allowing your team to push in and take control of site.

title: A Site to A Main Aftershock
description: This is a good aftershock to get an enemy lurking in A Main corner out and in the open for an easy kill.

title: Corner Near A Main Under Rafters To A Main Flash
description: This flash allows you to blind anyone peaking from A main. This flash is perfect for a quick peak or to change positions.

title: A Link to A Window Flashpoint
description: This flash is pretty hard to unpeek as a window player without giving up control. If you made it up A this far with a flash left over, this is a great one to seal out the round.

title: Close Right A Popflash
description: If you're in a pinch and playing close A with a shotgun or smg, this flash will catch attackers off guard and maybe score you some kills.

title: Garden Defense Flash from Window
description: Good for safetly securing a frag if you're holding A short. Flash pops low and in a pretty unexpected area.

title: Defender Spawn to A Generator Fault Line
description: This is a good fault line for A Site to stun and concuss anyone playing on-top of A Generator

title: B Main to Top B Green Aftershock
description: This is a good aftershock to get your opponent out of the common spot ontop of B Green.

title: B Garage to B Green Flashpoint
description: This is a good flash to blind anyone peeking B Garage from B Green or B Yellow.

title: A Pipes to A Site Aftershock
description: This is a good aftershock to prevent enemies from defusing the bomb.

title: A Nest to A Pipes Flashpoint
description: This is a good flashpoint for A Pipes to blind both sides allowing you to swing and get a kill.

title: A Belt Through A Nest Flashpoint
description: This flash is perfect to use when trying to push/peek from the upper area of A Site. As wall as for a defender to buy time to lurk close below the A Belt area!

title: Faultline From Kitchen Stairs To Tube
description: This faultline stuns all of the hallway into kitchen and tube making for an easy kill if anyone is pushed in.

title: Flashpoint From Mid Ramp Lower
description: This flashpoint not only blinds everyone peeking ramp but as well as the deepest angle that can see into the hallway of mid.

title: Faultline For B All Of B Site And Kitchen Entrance
description: This faultline is great for stunning a majority of the more difficult angles to deal with when entering B site.

title: B Site Railing Flashpoint
description: This flashing point is fantastic as it lands in a spot the enemy will not be ready for making it a lot harder to dodge. As well as allowing you to fully peek without worrying about being blind from your own flash!

title: A Rope to A Site Flashpoint
description: This is a good Flashpoint for A Site from A Ropes.

title: Bottom Mid to Top Mid Flashpoint
description: This is a good flashpoint to blind enemies in top mid from bottom mid.

title: A Hall Fault Line
description: This is a good fault line to concuss anyone playing

title: A Site to Back A Site Boxes Aftershock
description: This is a good aftershock to kill any enemies or force them out of hiding on A Site for an easy frag.
